title: My attempt at "The Curse of the Sad Mummy"

embed.description: Here's me trying to play the Curse of the Sad Mummy. I hope you all enjoy! Feel free to like or subscribe, and also check out my stream @ twitch.tv/threlnari! I in no way shape or form own this music.

body: Hey guys! Yesterday I finally recorded myself playing the curse of the sad mummy. I learned it entirely by ear, and memory. Any suggestions, tips or tricks i could use to play this (or any other song) better?

replies.body: The Battle Field Bad Company theme the original one had such an amazing sound to it :D

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=AxpniKEo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-12T22:59:01.515+0000)
>
> {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
> Thanks for sharing =)

Hello can i ask you some questions for a school project that i'm doing?
Sure thing, but it might be better to start a new thread -  I'll keep an eye out! =)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Eno,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=AxpniKEo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-12T22:59:01.515+0000)
>
> {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
> Thanks for sharing =)

No problem! I love this song so I figured I'd at least learn it.

Sounds good from my memory of it :)

EDIT:

10/10 would listen to again

> [{quoted}](name=R2D20,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=AxpniKEo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-13T15:56:28.957+0000)
>

> 
> EDIT:
> 
> 10/10 would listen to again

Haha thanks man. it might be a tad adapted, but that was simply cuz i had to conform the vocals to the song (if that makes any sense whatsoever) and to do that without modifying the song a bit would then require some parts to have 3 hands.
